name: api_physics_CharacterJoint
description: Character Joints are mainly used for Ragdoll effects.

properties.name: enableProjection
properties.description: Brings violated constraints back into alignment even when the solver fails.

properties.name: highTwistLimit
properties.description: The upper limit around the primary axis of the character joint.

properties.name: lowTwistLimit
properties.description: The lower limit around the primary axis of the character joint.

properties.name: projectionAngle
properties.description: Set the angular tolerance threshold (in degrees) for projection.

properties.name: projectionDistance
properties.description: Set the linear tolerance threshold for projection.

properties.name: swing1Limit
properties.description: The angular limit of rotation (in degrees) around the primary axis of the character joint.

properties.name: swing2Limit
properties.description: The angular limit of rotation (in degrees) around the primary axis of the character joint.

properties.name: swingAxis
properties.description: The secondary axis around which the joint can rotate.

properties.name: swingLimitSpring
properties.description: The configuration of the spring attached to the swing limits of the joint.

properties.name: twistLimitSpring
properties.description: The configuration of the spring attached to the twist limits of the joint.
